title: Hearty Beef and Pumpkin Stew
ingredients: ['900g beef stewing steak, cut into 2.5cm cubes', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided', '250ml water', '3 large potatoes, peeled and cubed', '4 carrots, sliced', '1 large green pepper, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 (400g) tin whole plum peeled tomatoes, chopped', '2 tablespoons beef stock granules', '1 sugar pumpkin']
